spec.name: Khalifi Building
spec.description: The Khalifi Building is a historical residential and commercial structure in the central Art Deco district of Casablanca. Its design likely dates back to the French Protectorate era (1920s-1930s), embodying the elegant, multi-story urban architecture of the time. The building continues to function as a mixed-use property, reflecting the enduring legacy of the Art Deco urban plan in this part of the city.

timeline.title: Construction Period
timeline.description: The building was constructed during the Art Deco boom period (Approximate date).

access.comment: Building is inhabited; exterior view is public, interior access is restricted to residents/tenants.
